Retrieved February 29, 2016 ==Biography== Bernhard Meurl von Leombach was born in 1452. On 4 May 1496, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VI as Auxiliary Bishop of Passau and Titular Bishop cof Libariensis. He served as Auxiliary Bishop of Passau until his death on 27 Jan 1526. While bishop, he was the principal co-consecrator of Berthold Pürstinger, Bishop of Chiemsee (1508). == References == Category:15th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VI Category:1452 births Category:1526 deaths
